MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA12 postcode area of Irvine. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:08am to carry out safe repair work to faulty equipment near Kilwinning Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:12am on 22nd November
